Discover Godâs Love & Grace.

Join us in connecting people to the life changing presence of Jesus Christ.

WHAT TO EXPECT

WHO IS JESUS

Welcome to Multiply Church

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Our Lead Pastor, Matt Malcolm

Weâre so glad youâve made it to our website! Weâd love you to join us at church one Sunday, and we hope you find us warm, friendly and welcoming. Come along anytime, on Sundays at 10:00am at 10 New Life Street.

Our vision is to be a church where all who come are shown the new life on offer in Jesus. We preach from the Bible and sing songs that remind us of biblical truths, like forgiveness, grace, salvation, and the majesty of Jesus.

We are a church for anyone. It doesnât matter where you are in life, where youâre from or where youâve been â thereâs something for everyone at New Life. We offer great kidsâ and youth programs on a Sunday and mid-week, and you can find out more about our ministries here on our website, or by getting in touch. We hope to see you soon!

item.title: Growth Groups
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
• Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Growth Groups

Growth Groups are gospel greenhouses for Christians. Growth Groups meet together in order to grow together as followers of Jesus Christ.

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget
FIND A GROUP
  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget
BECOME A LEADER
  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

What is a Growth Group?

A Growth Group is a group of Christians who are sacrificially committed to a purposeful gathering for mutual discipleship through the Word of God, fellowship in the gospel, prayer and practical pastoral care.

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Why go to a Growth Group on top of Sunday meetings?

Growth Groups are gospel greenhouses for Christians. Growth Groups meet together in order to grow together as followers of Jesus Christ. These groups are the primary vehicle for pastoral care and personal discipleship at North Coast Church. Growth Groups foster community on a deeper level than is possible at a Sunday gathering. Members of Growth Groups pray together, share life together, and allow the word of God to dwell richly amongst them. It may be a bit of an oversimplification, but on Sundays the gospel is proclaimed publicly through careful exposition of Scripture, while at Growth Groups that same gospel message is then applied specifically through prayerful study of Scripture.

Everyone is welcome to join a Growth Group. We urge all our members to be actively and committedly involved in a Growth Group for their own good and for the good of others. Growth Groups meet at various times during the week; many meet in peopleâs homes scattered across Perthâs northern suburbs. Groups usually meet weekly during school terms and have a break over the school holidays.

item.title: Jesus
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
• Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Jesus Christ

Utterly unique, incomparable and almost indescribable, despite being easily the most talked-about figure in all of history.

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

CONSIDER HIS INFLUENCE

Look at any suggested list of the five most influential human figures, and Jesus will be in each and every list. Amazingly, every other person on the list will claim some degree of allegiance to Jesus, some even professing to worship Him. And then, make up a list of all those who have claimed to be God. No one has ever, or can ever, appear on both lists â except One. No one has ever claimed to be God and successfully gathered a following. Those who claim to be God are universally acknowledged to be deceived. And yet, Jesus Christ alone fits comfortably into both lists. His claims to be Divine were unequivocal and despite that, even today, more than 2 billion people claim to feel His influence! What other religious leader can claim the accolades from every other religion as does Jesus Christ?

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

CONSIDER HIS LIFE

Was there anyone ever who did the things He did? His deeds are famously spoken of throughout the writings of the first century Roman Empire. Contemporary enemies and followers alike unanimously acknowledge His powers. Two thousand years later His actions are still studied. He turns water into wine; effortlessly walks on water; He speaks to storms and they obey; He heals every kind of disease without any hype or atmosphere; He even raises the dead. His teachings are unsurpassed, quoted by every religion and every belief system everywhere. His morals are beyond all questioning by all. The book containing His teaching remains the number one bestseller with no rival coming anywhere close.

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

CONSIDER HIS PERSON

Was there anyone ever who claimed the things Jesus claimed? He alone will sit in judgment upon our every word, thought and deed. He alone dispenses the right to life â as and when He pleases. He alone grants access to the Father. He alone is the truth and there is no truth outside of Him. He alone redeems all things and He alone will create the new heavens and the new earth. He alone has all authority in heaven and on earth. Was there any other being in all the Universe who claimed to be both God and man? According to Jesus Christ, our attitude to Him is the supreme question of our existence!

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

CONSIDER HIS ACHIEVEMENT

No one has ever claimed to be the Saviour of humanity, or the Universe for that matter. Where others point to their teachings or to the moral compass within, or to self-exertion and religious performance, Jesus stands in absolute contrast. He leaves nothing to us. He points to our hopeless inability. And then, in magnanimous generosity, He does what we cannot do. He alone dies and then returns to life again, having accomplished the restoration of the Universe and having dealt decisively with our deepest failings. On the cross, God the Son experiences separation from God the Father taking upon Himself everything wrong with the Universe. In an instant, reconciliation between the Creator and the Creation is achieved. His words, âIt is finishedâ echo through eternity. He has done it. Can anyone else claim such a thing?

Jesus Christ â man and God in perfect harmony. No Subject worthy of an eternity of study rewards us with such joy and wonder. Make a wise decision â donât ignore Him. Join those who make it their aim to seek Him and know Him.

item.title: Kids
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
• Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

LET THE LITTLE CHILDREN COME TO ME, AND DO NOT HINDER THEM, FOR THE KINGDOM OF HEAVEN BELONGS TO SUCH AS THESE.

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

New Life Kids

Children are welcome at Multiply Church! We aim to show all of our Kids the wonderful worth and work of Jesus by teaching the Bible to them in a Christ-centred, clear and engaging way.

Kids especially caters for children aged 2 years old to turning 11 years old this year. If you have children turning 12 years or older, check out our Multiply Youth page to learn about our Sunday and Friday night Youth programs.

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget
  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

A supervised creche is available for babies aged 0-2 for the duration of our Sunday Morning service. Let us care for your kids so you can enjoy sitting under God's Word!

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Meet Our Children's Pastor

Children are precious to Jesus, and theyâre precious to us too. At New Life Kids, it is our mission to share Jesus with children in a safe, fun and engaging way, helping them to see how awesome our God really is!

We canât wait to hang out with your kids at New Life Church. We have programs to suit all ages and stages, and weâre confident theyâll meet great friends and learn amazing truths about God.

Please donât hesitate to contact us if you have any questions about New Life Kids, and remember to check out our church FAQ page, with answers to all kinds of questions you may have about our church.

David Brian, Childrenâs Pastor

  • Remove Widget

Our Leadership & Team

We are a team who are passionate about one main thing, making much of Jesus Christ.

Duane Olivier

LEAD PASTOR, MESSAGE & MISSION PASTOR

Duane is responsible for the overall vision and direction of the church as it is set out in the gospel of Jesus Christ and is the primary preacher and teacher at North Coast. Other than the Lord Jesus and everything to do with Him, Duane loves his wife, his kids, and playing in the ocean.

item.title: What to expect
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
• Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Visiting a church for the first time can be a nerve-racking experience.

Hereâs a list of Frequently Asked Questions to help make a visit to New Life Church that little bit easier.

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget
WHAT TIME SHOULD I ARRIVE AT CHURCH?

If youâre planning to come to our Multiply Church service on Sunday mornings, Kids check-in opens at 9:45am and our service begins at 10:00. We suggest arriving a bit earlier to find a parking space and walk to our building. Our Help Team are ready to greet visitors from 9:30am onwards, so we would love you to arrive early if you can.

HOW LONG DOES THE SERVICE GO FOR?

Itâs hard to give an exact time, as our song and talk lengths can vary from week to week, but our services generally last 80 â 90 minutes, however weâd love you to stick around longer for a coffee so we can get to know you (and so you can get to know us!)

WHAT ARE YOUR BIBLE TALKS ABOUT?

Our pastors preach from the Bible. This means we open up the Bible before every talk, hear it read, and then hear the pastor explain it and apply it. We usually work through books of the Bible, looking at a small section week by week, but we sometimes hear about what the Bible says about particular topics. Every so often we have a guest preacher who might give a talk outside of our regular preaching series.

CAN I BRING MY KIDS?

Absolutely! We have many families attending Multiply Church. Each Sunday morning Multiply Kids opens from 9:45am and runs for the duration of our âadultâ service. Unsure where to take your children when you arrive? Just look for a Connect Team member or someone wearing a blue Multiply Kids shirt â theyâll be able to point you in the right direction!

We also run a supervised crÃ¨che for children under two years old. This is open from 9:15am onwards. There are three volunteers looking after the crÃ¨che each morning. You are welcome to leave your child with them (theyâll send you a text if your child does not settle), but you are also free to stay with your child in crÃ¨che.

During school terms, youth that are turning 12 to 14 years old are invited to join our boys and girls Junior Youth Growth Groups (held during the morning service). At Junior Growth Group, our youth are led in a Bible Study by our dedicated Youth Leaders.

We meet at 10:00am every Sunday

You are welcome anytime. Thereâs a place for you!

Come Join Us This Sunday

107 Treetop Ave, Edgewater WA 6027

Anyone and everyone is welcome to join us at our Sunday service. Your kids will be looked after at our supervised kidsâ programs, and youâre welcome to stay back after church for morning tea.

Ample parking is available on-site, with convenient wheelchair and pram access. We are located a short walk from the Edgewater Train Station.

item.title: Youth
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
• Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Youth

New Life Youth is a bunch of young people striving to magnify the glory of God through teaching and living the good news of Jesus Christ for the eternal good of all youth!

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Junior Youth

Junior Youth is for anyone turning 12 up to 14 years old. We meet every Friday night of the school term from 7-9PM at the North Coast Church Ministry Centre (15 Moolanda Boulevard, Kingsley, 6026).

When you join us you can expect to be welcomed warmly! After this we want you to connect with us as we hang out doing all sorts of stuff: table tennis, pool, card and board games, Xbox, foosball, volleyball, scribbling on the black board, or just chilling on the couch! During this time we will also have dessert and some drinks. At the heart of our night is the Bible. We all focus on a passage from the Bible and listen to one of the leaders explaining it to us. Following this we break up into groups to discuss what we heard and consider how it is to affect our lives. We finish the night doing what we do at the start. Bring your mates along to join all the action!

  • Duplicate Widget
  • Remove Widget

Senior Youth

Senior Youth is for anyone turning 15 up to 18 years old. We meet every Sunday afternoon of the school term from 3:30-5:30PM at the North Coast Church Ministry Centre (15 Moolanda Boulevard, Kingsley, 6026).

Letâs be honest, when you get to Senior Youth age itâs not all about the action any more, itâs about the people. Hanging out with people in a chilled environment is all you need. So when you join us on Sunday arvo we wonât have too much structured activities going. We will have good food and drinks as well as good company! At the heart of our afternoons is a time when we consider Jesus Christ from the Bible. We discuss the claims he made, the ridiculous things he did, the things he said (some of it was pretty crazy!), and whether He is worth believing. Bring your mates along, it will be sick to meet them!

[{"id":"tnbrjuk","elType":"section","settings":{"stretch_section":"section-stretched","structure":"20","background_background":"classic","background_image":{"id":"760","url":"https:\/\/demo.wpforchurch.com\/multiply\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/09\/background-08.jpg"},"background_position":"center center","background_size":"cover","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"140","right":"0","bottom":"140","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[{"id":"swepacu","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":60},"elements":[{"id":"ftpfwtl","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"Youth","header_size":"h1","title_color":"#ffffff","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":59}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"kclqdtk","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

New Life Youth is a bunch of young people striving to magnify the glory of God through teaching and living the good news of Jesus Christ for the eternal good of all youth!<\/p>","text_color":"#ffffff"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false},{"id":"rnmtjzw","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":40},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"dqsrhnx","elType":"section","settings":{"margin":{"unit":"px","top":"50","right":0,"bottom":"50","left":0,"isLinked":true}},"elements":[{"id":"dbwhcxm","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"vnbslyv","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"Junior Youth"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"biqnnpo","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Junior Youth is for anyone turning 12 up to 14 years old. We meet every Friday night of the school term from 7-9PM at the North Coast Church Ministry Centre (15 Moolanda Boulevard, Kingsley, 6026).<\/p>

When you join us you can expect to be welcomed warmly! After this we want you to connect with us as we hang out doing all sorts of stuff: table tennis, pool, card and board games, Xbox, foosball, volleyball, scribbling on the black board, or just chilling on the couch! During this time we will also have dessert and some drinks. At the heart of our night is the Bible. We all focus on a passage from the Bible and listen to one of the leaders explaining it to us. Following this we break up into groups to discuss what we heard and consider how it is to affect our lives. We finish the night doing what we do at the start. Bring your mates along to join all the action!<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"nonhfrq","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"Senior Youth"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"kmpeibu","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Senior Youth is for anyone turning 15 up to 18 years old. We meet every Sunday afternoon of the school term from 3:30-5:30PM at the North Coast Church Ministry Centre (15 Moolanda Boulevard, Kingsley, 6026).<\/p>

Let\u2019s be honest, when you get to Senior Youth age it\u2019s not all about the action any more, it\u2019s about the people. Hanging out with people in a chilled environment is all you need. So when you join us on Sunday arvo we won\u2019t have too much structured activities going. We will have good food and drinks as well as good company! At the heart of our afternoons is a time when we consider Jesus Christ from the Bible. We discuss the claims he made, the ridiculous things he did, the things he said (some of it was pretty crazy!), and whether He is worth believing. Bring your mates along, it will be sick to meet them!<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.content:encoded:
Discover Godâs
Love & Grace.

Join us in connecting people to the life
changing presence of Jesus Christ.

WHAT TO EXPECT WHO IS JESUS

Welcome to Multiply Church

Our Lead Pastor, Matt Malcolm

Weâre so glad youâve made it to our website! Weâd love you to join us at church one Sunday, and we hope you find us warm, friendly and welcoming. Come along anytime, on Sundays at 10:00am at 10 New Life Street.

Our vision is to be a church where all who come are shown the new life on offer in Jesus. We preach from the Bible and sing songs that remind us of biblical truths, like forgiveness, grace, salvation, and the majesty of Jesus.

We are a church for anyone. It doesnât matter where you are in life, where youâre from or where youâve been â thereâs something for everyone at New Life. We offer great kidsâ and youth programs on a Sunday and mid-week, and you can find out more about our ministries here on our website, or by getting in touch. We hope to see you soon!

Jesus Christ

Utterly unique, incomparable and almost indescribable, despite being easily the most talked-about figure in all of history

READ MORE

Latest Sermons

Check out our latest talks from the Bible, or subscribe to our Podcast.

Seeing Godâs Salvation

See Godâs Future Now

View All Sermons

âWhen I come to New Life Church itâs like Iâm coming home. I love the people here, and what they teach me about God and about life.â

â Jane Doe, age 32

Upcoming Events

Here is whatâs happening in the life of our church. Why not join us for our next event?

item.title: Growth Groups
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
Growth Groups

Growth Groups are gospel greenhouses for Christians. Growth Groups meet together in order to grow together as followers of Jesus Christ.

FIND A GROUP BECOME A LEADER

What is a Growth Group?

A Growth Group is a group of Christians who are sacrificially committed to a purposeful gathering for mutual discipleship through the Word of God, fellowship in the gospel, prayer and practical pastoral care.

Why go to a Growth Group on top of Sunday meetings?

Growth Groups are gospel greenhouses for Christians. Growth Groups meet together in order to grow together as followers of Jesus Christ. These groups are the primary vehicle for pastoral care and personal discipleship at North Coast Church. Growth Groups foster community on a deeper level than is possible at a Sunday gathering. Members of Growth Groups pray together, share life together, and allow the word of God to dwell richly amongst them. It may be a bit of an oversimplification, but on Sundays the gospel is proclaimed publicly through careful exposition of Scripture, while at Growth Groups that same gospel message is then applied specifically through prayerful study of Scripture.

Everyone is welcome to join a Growth Group. We urge all our members to be actively and committedly involved in a Growth Group for their own good and for the good of others. Growth Groups meet at various times during the week; many meet in peopleâs homes scattered across Perthâs northern suburbs. Groups usually meet weekly during school terms and have a break over the school holidays.

item.title: Jesus
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
Jesus Christ

Utterly unique, incomparable and almost indescribable, despite being easily the most talked-about figure in all of history.

CONSIDER HIS INFLUENCE

Look at any suggested list of the five most influential human figures, and Jesus will be in each and every list. Amazingly, every other person on the list will claim some degree of allegiance to Jesus, some even professing to worship Him. And then, make up a list of all those who have claimed to be God. No one has ever, or can ever, appear on both lists â except One. No one has ever claimed to be God and successfully gathered a following. Those who claim to be God are universally acknowledged to be deceived. And yet, Jesus Christ alone fits comfortably into both lists. His claims to be Divine were unequivocal and despite that, even today, more than 2 billion people claim to feel His influence! What other religious leader can claim the accolades from every other religion as does Jesus Christ?

CONSIDER HIS LIFE

Was there anyone ever who did the things He did? His deeds are famously spoken of throughout the writings of the first century Roman Empire. Contemporary enemies and followers alike unanimously acknowledge His powers. Two thousand years later His actions are still studied. He turns water into wine; effortlessly walks on water; He speaks to storms and they obey; He heals every kind of disease without any hype or atmosphere; He even raises the dead. His teachings are unsurpassed, quoted by every religion and every belief system everywhere. His morals are beyond all questioning by all. The book containing His teaching remains the number one bestseller with no rival coming anywhere close.

CONSIDER HIS PERSON

Was there anyone ever who claimed the things Jesus claimed? He alone will sit in judgment upon our every word, thought and deed. He alone dispenses the right to life â as and when He pleases. He alone grants access to the Father. He alone is the truth and there is no truth outside of Him. He alone redeems all things and He alone will create the new heavens and the new earth. He alone has all authority in heaven and on earth. Was there any other being in all the Universe who claimed to be both God and man? According to Jesus Christ, our attitude to Him is the supreme question of our existence!

CONSIDER HIS ACHIEVEMENT

No one has ever claimed to be the Saviour of humanity, or the Universe for that matter. Where others point to their teachings or to the moral compass within, or to self-exertion and religious performance, Jesus stands in absolute contrast. He leaves nothing to us. He points to our hopeless inability. And then, in magnanimous generosity, He does what we cannot do. He alone dies and then returns to life again, having accomplished the restoration of the Universe and having dealt decisively with our deepest failings. On the cross, God the Son experiences separation from God the Father taking upon Himself everything wrong with the Universe. In an instant, reconciliation between the Creator and the Creation is achieved. His words, âIt is finishedâ echo through eternity. He has done it. Can anyone else claim such a thing?

Jesus Christ â man and God in perfect harmony. No Subject worthy of an eternity of study rewards us with such joy and wonder. Make a wise decision â donât ignore Him. Join those who make it their aim to seek Him and know Him.

item.title: Kids
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
LET THE LITTLE CHILDREN COME TO ME, AND DO NOT HINDER THEM, FOR THE KINGDOM OF HEAVEN BELONGS TO SUCH AS THESE.

New Life Kids

Children are welcome at Multiply Church! We aim to show all of our Kids the wonderful worth and work of Jesus by teaching the Bible to them in a Christ-centred, clear and engaging way.

Kids especially caters for children aged 2 years old to turning 11 years old this year. If you have children turning 12 years or older, check out our Multiply Youth page to learn about our Sunday and Friday night Youth programs.

A supervised creche is available for babies aged 0-2 for the duration of our Sunday Morning service. Let us care for your kids so you can enjoy sitting under God's Word!

Meet Our Children's Pastor

Children are precious to Jesus, and theyâre precious to us too. At New Life Kids, it is our mission to share Jesus with children in a safe, fun and engaging way, helping them to see how awesome our God really is!

We canât wait to hang out with your kids at New Life Church. We have programs to suit all ages and stages, and weâre confident theyâll meet great friends and learn amazing truths about God.

Please donât hesitate to contact us if you have any questions about New Life Kids, and remember to check out our church FAQ page, with answers to all kinds of questions you may have about our church.

David Brian, Childrenâs Pastor

item.title: Our Staff
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
Our Leadership & Team

We are a team who are passionate about one main thing, making much of Jesus Christ.

Duane Olivier

LEAD PASTOR, MESSAGE & MISSION PASTOR

Duane is responsible for the overall vision and direction of the church as it is set out in the gospel of Jesus Christ and is the primary preacher and teacher at North Coast. Other than the Lord Jesus and everything to do with Him, Duane loves his wife, his kids, and playing in the ocean.

Matt Malcolm

ASSOCIATE LEAD PASTOR, MAGNIFICATION & MATURITY PASTOR

Matt is the director of staff and ministries. He assists the Lead Pastor in overseeing coaching, training and discipleship of all ministry staff and the implementation of our vision across all ministries of North Coast Church and Unichurch. He also oversees our Sunday gatherings. He is married to Kinny and they have three children; Kate, Sammy and Lucy.

Brendan Hurley

MINISTRY & CHILDRENâS PASTOR

Brendan is responsible for making sure our church remains focused on mission by training others in evangelism, coordinating our Search Course, and keeping mission at the forefront of what we do. Brendan is married to his lovely wife, Laura, has an awesome son named Ethan, and loves to play golf

Danie van Zijl

YOUTH & YOUNG ADULTS PASTOR

Danie facilitates all areas of youth ministry at North Coast Church, including our Friday Night Youth Group, Youth Growth Groups and Youth Camps. He loves spending time with his wife, watching footy and gardening.

Laura Hurley

CREATIVE MEDIA AND DESIGN

Laura works to ensure our churchâs message is heard, and uses creative, digital, print and social media to proclaim Jesus at North Coast Church. Laura is married to Brendan, and together they love coffee, date nights, and spending time with their crazy-cute toddler.

item.title: What to Expect
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
Visiting a church for the first time can be a nerve-racking experience.

Hereâs a list of Frequently Asked Questions to help make a visit to New Life Church that little bit easier.

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT TIME SHOULD I ARRIVE AT CHURCH?

If youâre planning to come to our Multiply Church service on Sunday mornings, Kids check-in opens at 9:45am and our service begins at 10:00. We suggest arriving a bit earlier to find a parking space and walk to our building. Our Help Team are ready to greet visitors from 9:30am onwards, so we would love you to arrive early if you can.

HOW LONG DOES THE SERVICE GO FOR?

Itâs hard to give an exact time, as our song and talk lengths can vary from week to week, but our services generally last 80 â 90 minutes, however weâd love you to stick around longer for a coffee so we can get to know you (and so you can get to know us!)

WHAT ARE YOUR BIBLE TALKS ABOUT?

Our pastors preach from the Bible. This means we open up the Bible before every talk, hear it read, and then hear the pastor explain it and apply it. We usually work through books of the Bible, looking at a small section week by week, but we sometimes hear about what the Bible says about particular topics. Every so often we have a guest preacher who might give a talk outside of our regular preaching series.

CAN I BRING MY KIDS?

Absolutely! We have many families attending Multiply Church. Each Sunday morning Multiply Kids opens from 9:45am and runs for the duration of our âadultâ service. Unsure where to take your children when you arrive? Just look for a Connect Team member or someone wearing a blue Multiply Kids shirt â theyâll be able to point you in the right direction!

We also run a supervised crÃ¨che for children under two years old. This is open from 9:15am onwards. There are three volunteers looking after the crÃ¨che each morning. You are welcome to leave your child with them (theyâll send you a text if your child does not settle), but you are also free to stay with your child in crÃ¨che.

During school terms, youth that are turning 12 to 14 years old are invited to join our boys and girls Junior Youth Growth Groups (held during the morning service). At Junior Growth Group, our youth are led in a Bible Study by our dedicated Youth Leaders.

item.title: When and Where
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
We meet at 10:00am every Sunday

You are welcome anytime. Thereâs a place for you!

Come Join Us This Sunday

107 Treetop Ave, Edgewater WA 6027

Anyone and everyone is welcome to join us at our Sunday service. Your kids will be looked after at our supervised kidsâ programs, and youâre welcome to stay back after church for morning tea.

Ample parking is available on-site, with convenient wheelchair and pram access. We are located a short walk from the Edgewater Train Station.

WHAT TO EXPECT KIDS

âWe hope you feel at home here at New Life Church. Our prayer is that by joining our church, youâll grow in your knowledge and love of God and his people.â

â Pastor Gary Green

item.title: Youth
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
Youth

New Life Youth is a bunch of young people striving to magnify the glory of God through teaching and living the good news of Jesus Christ for the eternal good of all youth!

Junior Youth

Junior Youth is for anyone turning 12 up to 14 years old. We meet every Friday night of the school term from 7-9PM at the North Coast Church Ministry Centre (15 Moolanda Boulevard, Kingsley, 6026).

When you join us you can expect to be welcomed warmly! After this we want you to connect with us as we hang out doing all sorts of stuff: table tennis, pool, card and board games, Xbox, foosball, volleyball, scribbling on the black board, or just chilling on the couch! During this time we will also have dessert and some drinks. At the heart of our night is the Bible. We all focus on a passage from the Bible and listen to one of the leaders explaining it to us. Following this we break up into groups to discuss what we heard and consider how it is to affect our lives. We finish the night doing what we do at the start. Bring your mates along to join all the action!

Senior Youth

Senior Youth is for anyone turning 15 up to 18 years old. We meet every Sunday afternoon of the school term from 3:30-5:30PM at the North Coast Church Ministry Centre (15 Moolanda Boulevard, Kingsley, 6026).

Letâs be honest, when you get to Senior Youth age itâs not all about the action any more, itâs about the people. Hanging out with people in a chilled environment is all you need. So when you join us on Sunday arvo we wonât have too much structured activities going. We will have good food and drinks as well as good company! At the heart of our afternoons is a time when we consider Jesus Christ from the Bible. We discuss the claims he made, the ridiculous things he did, the things he said (some of it was pretty crazy!), and whether He is worth believing. Bring your mates along, it will be sick to meet them!

item.title: Sermon Elements
item.dc:creator: igor
item.content:encoded:
Exclusive Elementor Styles

We have created 5 custom styles for Elementor so you can showcase your latest sermons however you like! Plus, new styles will be added over time. Check them out below.Â
